程序包 com.blade.exception

  • 异常错误概要 
    异常错误 说明
    BadRequestException
    HTTP 400 Exception
    BeanCopyException
    Bean Copy Exception
    BladeException
    Blade Exception, Base RuntimeException
    ForbiddenException
    HTTP 403 forbidden exception
    HttpParseException
    Http Param parse exception Contains form form parameter conversion, upload file
    InternalErrorException
    HTTP 500 internal error exception
    MethodNotAllowedException
    HTTP 405 Method Not Allowed
    NewInstanceException
    New instance exception
    NotFoundException
    HTTP 404 not found exception
    TemplateException  
    ValidatorException
    Java Bean Validator Exception
